Description: In this talk, we will introduce Quantitative Amplicon Sequencing (QASeq): a highly-sensitive method for the ultrasensitive detection and quantification of somatic Copy Number Variations (CNVs) and mutations from tissue and liquid biopsy samples. Using a PCR-based molecular barcoding NGS approach with high multiplexing, QASeq enables accurate, absolute quantitation of CNVs down to 5% heterozygous single copy gain or loss (ploidy=2.05/1.95). Additionally, we will introduce NuProbe’s custom assay development and validation solutions for oncology research applications.
